name: Earthquake City Builder
description:
Earthquake City Builder is a management game where you should create the bigger city on a very unstable ground where earthquakes occurs very often.

Don’t let your buildings get destroyed and do some research to unlock technology and upgrade for your building.

Start your city and face earthquakes.

Repair your buildings.

Upgrade your buildings.

Unlock some technologies.

Grow your city.

Be careful to not let your buildings collapse.

Note :

I planned much more features and animations but I got lack of time at the end..
I quickly did some balancing at the end, but I have no idea if it is good or not, so I apologize in advance for that.
